mutants.original_line: if not df.empty and sortby in ["Market Cap [$]", "Volume [$]"]:
mutants.mutated_line: if not df.empty or sortby in ['Market Cap [$]', 'Volume [$]']:

mutants.original_line: if not df.empty and sortby in ["Market Cap [$]", "Volume [$]"]:
mutants.mutated_line: if not df.empty and sortby not in ['Market Cap [$]', 'Volume [$]']:

mutants.original_line: if not df.empty and sortby in ["Market Cap [$]", "Volume [$]"]:
mutants.mutated_line: if not df.empty and sortby in ['', 'Volume [$]']:

mutants.original_line: if not df.empty and sortby in ["Market Cap [$]", "Volume [$]"]:
mutants.mutated_line: if not df.empty and sortby in ['Market Cap [$]', '']:
